<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[One for All](/Feats.aspx?ID=1519) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Emotion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=60" />
<trait label="Linguistic" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=101" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Swashbuckler" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=321" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 88 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
Trained in [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6)

</column>

---

With precisely the right words of encouragement, you bolster an ally's efforts. Designate an ally within 30 feet; this action counts as sufficient preparation to [Aid](/Actions.aspx?ID=75) that ally. When you use the Aid reaction to help that ally, you can roll [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) in place of the usual check. If your swashbuckler's style is [wit](/Styles.aspx?ID=5) and your Diplomacy check to Aid meets or exceeds the very hard DC for your level, you gain panache.
name: One for All
